events.message: I recently received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund because the replacement won't arrive soon enough.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to an incorrect item delivery.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund case for the customer who received the wrong product.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the mix-up with your order. I'm here to help you process your refund as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the incorrect item you received to assist us in processing your refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I've attached a photo showing the wrong item that was delivered instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and send you a prepaid return label to send the incorrect item back.
That sounds great, thank you! I appreciate the quick response and the prepaid label for the return.
Your refund has been processed successfully, and the return label has been emailed to you. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just following up to ensure you have received the refund and the return went smoothly. Please contact us if you have any more questions.
Since there has been no further contact, we are closing your refund case. Thank you for your patience and for contacting support.
